microcopy_top: This is about you, not perfection.

results.subtitle: Here's where you stand and where you're going.
results.focusAreas: Focus on these two areas to evolve into {avatar}:

7day.focus: Phone in another room for 2 hours.
7day.identity: Write your ideal day in detail.

course.subtitle: The Playbook for Men Ready to Level Up
course.description: A comprehensive system to transform your trajectory across all six domains.

interview.subtitle: One-on-One Strategy Session
interview.description: Get personalized recommendations for your specific situation.

coaching.subtitle: 1:1 Coaching Program
coaching.description: Weekly sessions to accelerate your growth and hold you accountable.

hero.title: What's steering your trajectory right now?
hero.subtitle: Find your Trajectory Avatar in 10 minutes.

preview.title: See your domains in action
preview.subtitle: Get instant insights across six key areas

gate.title: Your Trajectory Snapshot is ready.
gate.subtitle: Where should we send it?
gate.privacy: Answers are private. Growth is personal.

balancer.name: BALANCER
balancer.description: You maintain equilibrium across domains, but may lack breakthrough momentum.
balancer.evolution: Focus on energy and focus to become an ARCHITECT.

architect.name: ARCHITECT
architect.description: You design your life with intention and build systems that work.
architect.evolution: You're already operating at a high level. Maintain and optimize.

warrior.name: WARRIOR
warrior.description: You have strong energy and focus but may struggle with relationships and emotions.
warrior.evolution: Focus on relationships and emotions to become an ARCHITECT.

sage.name: SAGE
sage.description: You have deep emotional intelligence and focus but may need more energy and financial security.
sage.evolution: Focus on energy and finances to become an ARCHITECT.

builder.name: BUILDER
builder.description: You're strong in finances and relationships but may need more energy and focus.
builder.evolution: Focus on energy and focus to become an ARCHITECT.

seeker.name: SEEKER
seeker.description: You're exploring your identity and have potential across all domains.
seeker.evolution: Focus on your two lowest domains to become an ARCHITECT.
